sense.def:
To emerge
pomeni priti iz nekega kraja, kjer nas ni bilo mogoče videti.

seg.quote: I saw the woman emerge from a shop.

sense.def:
To emerge from a difficult or bad experience
pomeni priti do konca hudega doživetja.

seg.quote: Few emerge from the experience unscathed.

sense.def:
Kadar neko dejstvo
emerges from a discussion or investigation
, postane znano kot posledica nekega razgovora ali preiskave.

seg.quote: One really interesting thing emerged from this research.
It emerged that she had been drinking.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer industrija ali politično gibanje,
emerges
, začne obstajati.
